name: Menorah's Quest
description:
Welcome here stranger, discover on this page the first ever Jam made game by pepnou and enderswype. We hope hope you have a great time playing it, feel free to leave a comment and share it with your friends.

Controls : 

W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move around and space to use your candle ability

Here are some download links for you to have fun :
